plot: Gus and his Dirty Dead Dad is a bad luck, big heart comedy about facing up to the things you can't change. It's about a young man desperately clinging to the only memories he has left, of a father he didn't really know.
title: Gus and His Dirty Dead Dad
plot_es: Gus and his Dirty Dead Dad is a bad luck, big heart comedy about facing up to the things you can't change. It's about a young man desperately clinging to the only memories he has left, of a father he didn't really know.
